SupportedFeatures

public struct SupportedFeatures

SupportedFeatures.

  • customPronunciation

    If true, the voice can be customized; if false, the voice cannot be customized. (Same as customizable.).

    Declaration

    Swift

    public var customPronunciation: Bool
  • voiceTransformation

    If true, the voice can be transformed by using the SSML <voice-transformation> element; if false, the voice cannot be transformed.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public var voiceTransformation: Bool
  • init(customPronunciation:voiceTransformation:)

    Initialize a SupportedFeatures with member variables.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public init(customPronunciation: Bool, voiceTransformation: Bool)

    Parameters

    customPronunciation

    If true, the voice can be customized; if false, the voice cannot be customized. (Same as customizable.).
    voiceTransformation

    If true, the voice can be transformed by using the SSML <voice-transformation> element; if false, the voice cannot be transformed.

    Return Value

    An initialized SupportedFeatures.

  • init(from:)

    Declaration

    Swift

    public init(from decoder: Decoder) throws
  • encode(to:)

    Declaration

    Swift

    public func encode(to encoder: Encoder) throws
